4 hours ago, Ninadragonborn said:

ok now i get it. no i haven't test it with only FMRS because its 70 mods but if its really neccessery to remove all those mods  and there is no other way i will do i

You definitely don't have to remove any mods.  KSP has no copy protection.  Therefore, you can copy the game folder as many times as you wish for your own personal use.  Never play on your original download.  Keep it as a pristine copy source.   If you use Steam, don't allow it to update unless you're prepared and willing.  As an aside, I don't think there will be many more KSP 1 updates but better safe...

Begin with a new, clean KSP download from from wherever you purchased the game.  Copy that to another folder and run that copy to the main menu then exit the game (the game creates files on first startup).  Install FMRS and the minimum dependencies necessary to launch a test vessel.  Test FMRS and see if you still get the errors.  Post the log file link and any pictures here.  Add a couple of mods.  Rinse and repeat the testing until you've a) identified the problem by adding/removing mods, or b) installed all of your mods and couldn't recreate the problem.

If you need a specific craft to perform the tests, make sure you install the fewest mods necessary.  Rebuild the vessel or copy the craft file from your main save.  Use the Alt-F12 cheat menu to make testing easier if necessary.  Post the log file link and pictures.

So, you are using multiple complicated mods, KRAMAX, FAR.

You have a lot going on.  Including what appears to be something that might be wrong with the craft file.

There may be a mod conflict, not sure.  Try making a new, clean install, with just FMRS and try to replicate it.  If it works, add a few more mods and try again.  Keep doing this until either you have it fail, or you have all the mods installed.

Hello there!

I Just have a few questions about the mod?

1. Should it be safe to install the mod in a midgame safefile?

2.Is the re anything special to setup for RSS/RP1?

Because im allready pretty far in my RP1 playthrough and a viewer of me just mentioned i should use ur mods FMRS+RecoveryController to land my Stages and recover them. Well Its a great Idea but now the problem comes. After i installed FMRS+RC i tested some older crafts wich all should be able to reach orbit (tested this amssivly long befor) , but now they dont reach the orbit anymore. Today i figured out that when i replace the parts that start to drift away its all fine again. So here comes my 3rd question.

3. What does the mod change on existing craft and/or existing engines aswell as Procedural Parts?

 

Another wird thing is that after installing your mods, my Saved SaturnV Rocket with the Apollo Module on top i should ahve 3 Science Experiments on the CommandModule. But yea fter installing it seems that the craftfile only give me 2 Science Experiments anymore. Any reasons Why?

 

MFg
